charaepi_ch0297_00_volo/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] had just finished some
preparations in town.
charaepi_ch0297_00_volo/2301_1101_0200_2:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] was about to set out on another adventure
when...
charaepi_ch0297_00_volo/2301_1201_0400_1: Did I surprise you? I bet I did!
charaepi_ch0297_00_volo/2301_1201_0600_1: You looked tense, so I thought I’d help you relax!
charaepi_ch0297_00_volo/2301_1201_0700_1:
Since you’re one of my valued customers,
[Name:PlayerNickname ], I want to make sure
that you’re always at your best!
charaepi_ch0297_00_volo/2301_0301_0900_1:
You actually made me
more nervous...
charaepi_ch0297_00_volo/2301_0401_1000_1: Ah, I do beg your pardon! I really meant no harm!
charaepi_ch0297_00_volo/2301_0401_1100_1: Well then, to make up for it...
charaepi_ch0297_00_volo/2301_0402_1300_1:
Of course! I’m always looking out for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0297_00_volo/2301_0402_1400_1: And I’m not the only one, either.
charaepi_ch0297_00_volo/2301_1201_1500_1: Please accept some encouragement from Togepi!
charaepi_ch0297_00_volo/2301_1201_1600_1:
Did you know that Togepi’s smile has the power to
soothe the soul?
charaepi_ch0297_00_volo/2301_1201_1700_1:
Just one look at that adorable face will make all
your worries disappear!
charaepi_ch0297_00_volo/2301_1201_1800_1:
I know it’s not much, but Togepi and I have been
going around lifting everyone’s spirits!
charaepi_ch0297_00_volo/2301_0401_2000_1: Do you really want to know?
charaepi_ch0297_00_volo/2301_0401_2100_1:
This is a trade secret...but for you, I’ll let you in
on it!
charaepi_ch0297_00_volo/2301_0402_2400_1:
It benefits me when people are in a kind, gentle
mood!
charaepi_ch0297_00_volo/2301_1201_2500_1:
The happier they’re feeling, the more likely they
are to purchase from me!
charaepi_ch0297_00_volo/2301_1201_2600_1:
I can provide goods to satisfied customers—and
put a few coins in my pocket at the same time!
charaepi_ch0297_00_volo/2301_1201_2700_1: That way, everyone’s happy and smiling!
charaepi_ch0297_00_volo/2301_1201_2800_1:
Everyone wants to be happy, don’t they? I’m sure
you do, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0297_00_volo/2301_1201_3000_1: Not everything that happens in this world is good.
charaepi_ch0297_00_volo/2301_1201_3100_1:
Whenever I meet with something painful or
heartbreaking, I can’t help but wonder why life is
so unfair.
charaepi_ch0297_00_volo/2301_1201_3200_1:
That’s how I felt when I was young. Of course, I
imagine we all go through something like that.
charaepi_ch0297_00_volo/2301_1201_3300_1:
Just imagine... A perfect world, with no sorrow
or pain...
charaepi_ch0297_00_volo/2301_1201_3400_1:
I look forward to the day when that world
becomes a reality!
